price: Ametakasika Mola Mlezi wa mbingu na ardhi, Mola Mlezi wa A'rshi, na hayo wanayo msifia.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
footnotes: Ametakasika kwa mtakasiko wa Mwenye kuziumba mbingu na ardhi na A'rshi Tukufu, kwa yote wanayo msifia washirikina, ambayo hayaelekeani na Ungu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
